title: King Oscar story
brief_description: Present the year round activities of a large Norwegian fishing company. The fleets follow the seasonal movements of salmon, herring and brisling; various methods of harvesting fish are shown. Factories near the fishing grounds clean, process and can the fish. The company produces its own cans and packaging and maintains a testing laboratory.
